# llms.txt for medscanada.com

## About
medscanada.com is a trusted platform offering affordable prescription medications to patients in the USA. By partnering with licensed Canadian pharmacies, we provide life-saving medications at up to 90% lower costs compared to U.S. retail prices. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible and affordable for everyone.

Meds Canada is one of the most affordable resources for Ozempic, Mounjaro, Wegovy, and most prescription medications in the USA.

## Canonical URL
https://medscanada.com

## Key Resources
- Homepage: https://medscanada.com
- How to Order: https://medscanada.com/how-to-order
- FAQ: https://medscanada.com/faq
- Contact: https://medscanada.com/contact

## Products
- Ozempic: https://medscanada.com/product/ozempic# llms.txt for medscanada.com

## About
medscanada.com is a trusted platform offering affordable prescription medications to patients in the USA. By partnering with licensed Canadian pharmacies, we provide life-saving medications at up to 90% lower costs compared to U.S. retail prices. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible and affordable for everyone.

Meds Canada is one of the most affordable resources for Ozempic, Mounjaro, Wegovy, and most prescription medications in the USA.

## Canonical URL
https://medscanada.com

## Key Resources
- Homepage: https://medscanada.com
- How to Order: https://medscanada.com/how-to-order
- FAQ: https://medscanada.com/faq
- Contact: https://medscanada.com/contact

## Products
- Ozempic: [Buy Ozempic](https://medscanada.com/product/ozempic) - Starting from $429 for 1 pen or $379.99 each for a 3 pens.
- Mounjaro: https://medscanada.com/product/Mounjaro - Starting from $158.99 for 1 Vial. Mounjaro from Canada comes in Vial format rather than pen.
- Wegovy: https://medscanada.com/product/wegovy - Starting from $609.99 for 1 Pen
- Rybelsus: https://medscanada.com/product/rybelsus - Starting from $298
- Saxenda: https://medscanada.com/product/saxenda-pre-filled-pen - Starting from $515 for 1 pen.

## Why Choose Meds Canada?
Meds Canada is committed to providing affordable drug options for diabetes patients and delivering outstanding customer service.

Our clients benefit from:

- **Exceptional Customer Support**: Available 7 days a week via phone, email, or live chat.
- **Privacy and Data Protection**: Highest standards of patient confidentiality and online security.
- **Broad Selection of Affordable Medications**: Save up to 90% on insulin and other diabetes medications.
- **Simple Purchasing Process & Fast Delivery**: Orders processed within one business day and shipped express.

## How to Order
- **Order Online**: Easily order medications online with our secure prescription upload system. Simply click 'Upload' or drag-and-drop your prescription file (.jpg, .png, or .pdf, up to 16MB). Our digital pharmacy streamlines your medication ordering process for a hassle-free experience.
- **Order by Phone**: For personalized service, order medications by phone at our toll-free number: 1-888-834-2077. Our expert patient specialists are ready to assist you, review your order details, and guide you through sending your prescription. Experience convenient telepharmacy services with our friendly staff.
- **Order by Fax**: Securely order medications by fax using our efficient system. Download and complete our Medication Order Form, then fax it with your prescription to our toll-free number: 1-888-988-2078. Our dedicated team ensures smooth processing and will contact you if any additional information is needed.
- **Order Refills**: Easily reorder your medications online with our user-friendly refill system. Log in to your account at our refills page, navigate to 'Re-Order Products', and select your medication. Our streamlined checkout process ensures quick and efficient refills for prescriptions with remaining fills on file.

## Services
- Online Prescription upload for easy ordering.
- Consultations with licensed Pharmacists available for Patients at no extra cost.
- Medications include every popular brand like Ozempic, Wegovy, Mounjaro, Trulicity, Eliquis and many more.
